Title: Provides for the development and creation of distributed ledger technology and business entities that develop such technology
Summary: Relates to the development and creation of distributed ledger technology, which is a mathematically secured, chronological, and decentralized consensus ledger or database, whether maintained via internet interaction, peer-to-peer network, or otherwise used to authenticate, record, share and synchronize transactions in their respective electronic ledgers or databases, and business entities that develop distributed ledger technology.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to the development and creation of distributed ledger technology and business entities that develop such technology
